Ramón Quadreny https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ram%C3%B3n_Quadreny 0 Ramón Quadreny (1892–1961) was a Spanish film director and actor. He directed the 1942 smuggling thriller Blood in the Snow. Ramón_Quadreny ( 1892 – 1961 ) was a_Spanish_film_director_and_actor . He directed the_1942_smuggling_thriller_Blood in the_Snow .
